user_query: I want to organize a surprise birthday party for my best friend. Can you suggest some unique party ideas and decorations? Also, recommend an email marketing service that can help me send out digital invitations to all the guests.

TaskList.description: Research and gather unique party ideas and decoration suggestions for a surprise birthday party.
Compile the list of party ideas and decorations into a format that can be easily shared with others.
Identify and recommend an email marketing service that specializes in sending digital invitations.
Create a draft email invitation template to be sent to guests using the chosen email marketing service.
Send the digital invitations to all guests using the email marketing service.
